text: decided to take a look at the quarterly patch, but `checkPoFiles` returns 910 issues :scream_cat:

elements.text: decided to take a look at the quarterly patch, but

text: Translation errors? If yes, would you like to share so that translators may look at it?

elements.text: Translation errors? If yes, would you like to share so that translators may look at it?

text:
most of the errors seem to be char encoding issues, such as

```./src/library/stats/po/lt.po:947                                                                                                                                                                                                               
random.c:335                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
translating strings with "bytes" encoding is not allowed                                                                                                                                                                                       
negative probability                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
neigiama tikimyb\xc4\x97  ```
but there are quite a few translation erros as well due to messed up percentage signs, such as:

```./src/library/tools/po/R-ar.po:18
too few entries, translation contains arabic percent sign U+066A
Checking %s
جاري التحقق من ٪s```
or wrong number of placeholder values:

```./src/library/stats/po/R-ca.po:62
too many entries
'x' must be numeric
«%s» ha de ser numèric```

text: oh, btw, `length(po_report)` is not the # of issues :slightly_smiling_face: `nrow(po_report)` is -- just 182 (phew)

summary of diagnoses:

```        template_issue
language FALSE TRUE
   ar        0    2
   ca        0    4
   de        0    4
   es        0   11
   hu        0    2
   lt      152    0
   nn        0    1
   pl        0    2
   pt_BR     0    2
   tr        0    1
   zh_CN     0    1```
`lt` has all those bytes encoding issues. Everything else is sprintf template stuff

text:
as to why it's showing up now... I do see tiny diffs of `lt` files e.g.

```git diff svn/main weblate/master -- src/library/stats/po/lt.po
diff --git a/src/library/stats/po/lt.po b/src/library/stats/po/lt.po
index f04de778f5..e3e5153320 100644
--- a/src/library/stats/po/lt.po
+++ b/src/library/stats/po/lt.po
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 msgid ""
+
 msgstr ""
 "Project-Id-Version: \n"
 "Report-Msgid-Bugs-To: bugs.r-project.org\n"
@@ -12,6 +13,7 @@ msgstr ""
 "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n"
 "X-Generator: Poedit 2.4.1\n"
 
+
 #: Srunmed.c:63
 msgid "bandwidth/span of running medians is larger than n"
 msgstr "einamųjų medianų pralaidumas / span yra didesnis nei n"```
could explain why it didn't show up before. doesn't explain the error though... confirming I don't see it on `r-devel/r-svn` or the official `svn` trunk. maybe weblate does some weird thing with encoding?

otoh it's marked as UTF-8:
<https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/blob/224f6d142e1cb747fd5fac4ca40079a3e24fe42d/src/library/stats/po/lt.po#L11>

The two files are also identical on a bit-by-bit level except that the weblate copy has to extra newlines at byte 10 & 351

text:
<@U01N3ET8N82> were you working on the weblate machine and its git repo directly? I see the following error while trying to update weblate from svn:

```On branch master
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
	modified:   src/library/stats/po/lt.po

Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
	.gitattributes
	src/library/deconflict_add_continue.py
	src/library/show_conflicts.py

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")


Possible cleanups:

Would remove .gitattributes
Would remove src/library/deconflict_add_continue.py
Would remove src/library/show_conflicts.py
Would remove tests/Pkgs/exNSS4/man/```
